topics.body:
So we just went out to get some dinner and "this song":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UEME182Q3G4 immediately starts playing

My mom turns the volume up really high and starts singing along to it

Usually I do everything I can to make her stop but I didn't feel like it this time, it's a great freaking song, and I wanted to sing along too but I dunno I guess I'm just too uptight
